nodes.text: The Paladin was one of the main characters in Senator Onaconda Farr's play, The Trickery of Vosdia Nooma. He and the Soldier were once comrades before the Soldier left to pursue other venues. When Vosdia Nooma, baron of the town of Yusk, struggled with internal and external strife, the Paladin offered the use of a personal army to protect himself and his people from rebelling outlying farmers stirred up by the Soldier; Nooma refused and the Paladin left.
The Paladin was played by Fosin Dreed.
